data.introduce: LccAirShopping接口根据出发地、目的地、出发时间和旅客类型（支持成人、儿童、婴儿等旅客类型），查询可选的直达、往返、中转航班，接口返回始发地和目的地的数据列表信息、行程数据列表信息、乘客数据列表信息、航段数据列表信息、舱位价格数据列表信息、以及offer信息。
data.business:
通过出发地、目的地、出发时间和旅客类型查询对应的航班信息。
支持成人、儿童、婴儿旅客类型；
支持直达、往返、中转航班查询。
data.functions: 通过出发地、目的地、出发时间和旅客类型查询对应的航班信息
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"IATA_AirShoppingRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"LCC航班查询接口","children":[{"name":"MessageDoc","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"消息文档信息","children":[{"name":"Name","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"A name is a word or phrase that constitutes the distinctive designation of a person, place, thing or concept","children":[]}]},{"name":"Party","type":"object","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"发送人相关方信息。","children":[{"name":"Sender","type":"object","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"发送方信息","children":[{"name":"TravelAgency","type":"object","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"一种私人零售商或公共服务，代表供应商向公众提供旅行和旅游相关服务，如活动、航空公司、汽车租赁、邮轮、酒店、铁路、旅行保险和旅行团。","children":[{"name":"AgencyID","type":"object","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"An identifier is a character string used to uniquely identify one instance of an object within an identification scheme that is managed by an agency.","children":[]},{"name":"IATANumber","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"A mathematical number that is assigned or is determined by calculation.","children":[]},{"name":"Name","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"BDT with value constraints for proper, regular names (e.g. Individual Surname, Individual First Name, Company Name, etc.).","children":[]},{"name":"PseudoCityID","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"An identifier is a character string used to uniquely identify one instance of an object within an identification scheme that is managed by an agency.","children":[]}]}]}]},{"name":"PayloadAttributes","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"IATA标准Payload属性。","children":[{"name":"TrxID","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"An agency.","children":[]},{"name":"VersionNumber","type":"object","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"A mathematical number that is assigned or is determined by calculation.","children":[]}]},{"name":"Request","type":"object","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"AirShoppingRQ请求内容。","children":[{"name":"FlightCriteria","type":"object","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"航班查询基本条件（如出发到达地、出发到达时间等）。","children":[{"name":"OriginDestCriteria","type":"object","quantity":"1..2","default":"","description":"始发地和目的地查询条件。","children":[{"name":"CalendarDateCriteria","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"指定的日期范围内，为相同的购物标准另外包含报价预览。","children":[{"name":"DaysAfterNumber","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"A mathematical number that is assigned or is determined by calculation.","children":[]},{"name":"DaysBeforeNumber","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"A mathematical number that is assigned or is determined by calculation.","children":[]}]},{"name":"DestArrivalCriteria","type":"object","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"目的地信息","children":[{"name":"IATALocationCode","type":"object","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"Additional BDT to specify the codeset which defines the IATA airport or city codes.","children":[]}]},{"name":"OriginDepCriteria","type":"object","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"起飞点信息","children":[{"name":"Date","type":"object","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"A date is a Gregorian calendar representation in various common resolutions: year, month, week, day.","children":[]},{"name":"IATALocationCode","type":"object","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"Additional BDT to specify the codeset which defines the IATA airport or city codes.","children":[]}]}]}]},{"name":"Paxs","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"旅客信息。","children":[{"name":"Pax","type":"object","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"旅客信息","children":[{"name":"PaxID","type":"object","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"An applying to a Passenger.","children":[]}]}]}]}]}]
